website_summaries.verdict: Well-crafted gong that's suitable for various uses, including meditation or fun work "announcements.
pros: Rich, deep sound – powerful for its small size
Works in various settings, from offices to chapels to yoga studios
cons: Rare reports of mallet missing from the shipment

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sounds awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love my gong! It makes a great sound. I use this as a closing sound for the end of each Reiki session. Beautiful and lightweight. My clients enjoy ringing the gong at times as well 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shelton

customer_reviews.title: It sounds amazing!! Only issue was that the mallet had ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a fathers day gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it! It sounds amazing!! Only issue was that the mallet had a broken tip when we took it out of the box but the gong and stand were in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked used and beat up
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken a photo of it before I sent it back. I was real excited about getting it. I set up a place to display it as the one I had seen before was beautiful. when I pulled it out of the box I could not believe my eyes. It looked disgusting.ie: the color was very dull, it had missing paint, scratches and little dents on the inside. It looked like it came out of a garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Gong love
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to the gong. You get what you pay for in this item. Don't cheat yourself, go for the Zildjian.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. Dinky mallet—get the Zildjian Gong Mallet to go with it. The mallet looks big, but creates a mellow, powerful tone.
customer_reviews.author: Zazeyay

customer_reviews.title: The sound is amazing. It came in an unbranded box
customer_reviews.text: Everyone compliments it and loves to hit it. The sound is amazing. It came in an unbranded box, the logo is severely off center, and it's missing hook for the striker. This is a good sounding gong.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I got this gong for our office to ring every time we have a software release. It's not a huge orchestral gong but it does have a very nice loud ring to it. I was surprised how much noise it could actually produce. My only (half) complaint is that stand is not the same as the one in the picture. The given stand is still functional (and probably sturdier) so I've uploaded a picture of what the stand actually looks like in case you guys care.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brand
customer_reviews.text: Why do we need a gong? I have no idea, but my husband wanted one and loves it. It's very nice, good quality. If you're in the market for a gong I would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: and seem fine quality, however the mallet provided does not have ...
customer_reviews.text: The gong and stand are as pictured, and seem fine quality, however the mallet provided does not have a hole or string to hang on the stand. The handle is so thin I'm afraid to take it upon myself to drill a hole. It's pretty critical to me to have the mallet hanging on the stand so that it is usable and doesn't get lost, so I was disappointed to find it was not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound and tone
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I am using it for my staff. They get to hit the gong when they get a sale. It has been a great motivator and they all want to get the opportunity to hit it. It has a really great sound and tone. Highly recommend. The size is just right. Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: My friend was going to use bells of truce in her wedding ceremony. I got her this for a wedding present because its fun. She used this in place of the bells in her wedding ceremony and they keep this on their mantle. It has a great sound and makes great decor. I'm sure it has ended a few quarrels.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the cancer center where I work so patients can hit the gong when they complete testament. It has a good sounds. I needs to drill a hole in the maillot and string the rope through so I could hang it on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gong as a gift and they loved it. The appearance and sound are outstanding for the value
customer_reviews.author: Cogmastax

customer_reviews.title: A very nice gong. Shame about the logo
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice gong. It's a substantial weight, with a loud, strong sound that sustains well. The stand is the new rectangular design, which is much better than the original curved arm on a small circular base. My only complaint is the ugly, oversized Zildjian logo. There are videos on YouTube describing how to remove logos from Zildjian cymbals, so I may give it a whirl and see if I can remove the logo from the gong.
customer_reviews.author: Drdul

customer_reviews.title: Ring of success
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a stock market bell for my team at work (Starbucks HQ). Whenever we deploy to production, fix something, learn something new, etc we ring the bell or gong.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Zildjian quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We use it to celebrate college admissions in our building.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Fun for our office, big collection day bang the gong
customer_reviews.author: C. Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: Second one of these that I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these that I have bought. Now they are used in both my office and my boyfriends office to celebrate employee victories
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I teach 7th grade to innercity kids and it can get really loud in the classroom. This gong was a perfect change from the coach whistle I used to have to use to get their attention. It is a nice size for my desk and the sound radiates a wonderful tone without being brash or harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. DeMino

customer_reviews.title: Great gong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gong for myself. It's very attractive and is very powerful when properly struck. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: W.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great gong! Dinky mallet.
customer_reviews.text: Well made gong. Wouldn't expect any less from Zildjian. Only complaint is that it comes with a dinky mallet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SALES TOOL!
customer_reviews.text: HUGE hit in our sales office. The gong is talked about all the time. It changed the culture within out office very quickly! 10X
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bullet

customer_reviews.title: Mind the Pitch
customer_reviews.text: So this is a good gong, but not exactly what I expected as you may have seen in some of the other reviews. I actually really like the size, but am not thrilled with the sound it produces - a bit higher in pitch than I'd hoped for. I've heard you need a larger one to produce the lower rumble.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing to wake up my wife for coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I cashed in a Black Bush whisky container of change and bought this gem. Nothing to assemble and it has a really nice sound. Easily heard upstairs. In fact I bet I could wake up the whole block if I put my mind to it. The mallet is a little cheesy but the gong and stand are very nice. I will put some sticky felt dots on the bottom of the stand. My next door neighbor used to sell percussion instruments for Sabian and he seemed fairly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to put the pressure on
customer_reviews.text: This thing helps me notify production every time we make a sale up front. Fun way to put the pressure on.....
customer_reviews.author: Razorgrad

customer_reviews.title: Great Office Gong
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my office, great sound, sturdy, and larger than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Coons

customer_reviews.title: it has a wonderful rich sound
customer_reviews.text: For it size, it has a wonderful rich sound. I used it in a chapel service to announce the Stations of the Cross. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice sounding gong; would recommend
customer_reviews.text: When patients graduate from cardiac rehab they get to hit the gong in celebration!
customer_reviews.author: slm03

customer_reviews.title: A fine sound. And
customer_reviews.text: The resonance was more than I had thought. A fine sound. And, shipping and service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Walberg

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a motivational tool at work. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a motivational tool at work. It was an immediate hit. Still a tad smaller than I wanted it to be, but there is a significant jump in price if you try to go larger than this size.
customer_reviews.author: swat8888

customer_reviews.title: It's sounds nice and loud throughout the whole office
customer_reviews.text: I placed it in a central place in our office. Whenever we make a sale the salesperson hits the gong. It's sounds nice and loud throughout the whole office.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: For the size a very rich and full sound. Very pleased. Note-- the hammer didn't come with a string to hang on the hook.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: Zildjian Gong
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gong sounds nice but the stand pictured is not the stand you get. I ended up getting a square stand. Also, it did not come with a mallet so I had to go to the music store to buy a mallet, and guess what? They don't sell single mallets. I had to buy a pair, cut it shorter and drill a hole so I can hang it from the stand like it's supposed to be. Oh well, at least I have an extra mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little gong with sound that resonates just like the big one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift and was very well received! It has a very nice gong sound to it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M. White

customer_reviews.title: great sound!
customer_reviews.text: i was hoping for something a little deeper, but i understand that one needs a bigger pricier gong. but i am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small gong
customer_reviews.text: Small and mighty . Great sound for a small gong. Very impressed . Great gift idea !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our office to award great actions. We use this every day.
customer_reviews.author: John R Burton

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a big gong with a big full sound. I lead workshops with up to 300 people in the room, and I need to get their attention in a way that maintains my credibility. I was worried that this would be a tiny, tinny toy. It's not. I can carry it around and set it on a table, but the sound is really nice. (If I hit it too hard, it does get shrill).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Klein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality gong, sturdy and well made stand, mallet included. Not cheap, but worth every dollar. You may want to stick pads under legs to avoid marking furniture or floor. Superficially, a gong is a one note instrument. Not so in practice: hitting at different distances from the center will activate or deactivate certain harmonics and a variety of chords (not in the usual chromatic scale) can be produced. Also, the quality of the sound depends on the way you hit. Interestingly, the gong is activated by nearby noises (for instance, a loud conversation). No wonder that composers like Olivier Messiaen were endlessly fascinated with the sound of gongs.
customer_reviews.author: H. O. Fattorini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for the money
customer_reviews.text: I used this to 'bring to order' a large group at a speaking engagement. "The sound vibrated thru my bones" was the remark of one from the group as I walked past them. After the event my wife found a place in our LR that really enhances the decor. For the price I am completely satisfied. I'm looking for the next opportunity to use it.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gong!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my partner who teaches high school English as a back to school present. He loves it! The sound is great, not tinny, you can tell this is an actual musical instrument. It does come with a rubber ball striker, but due to confusion in reviews I also bought a larger Tibet an felt striker which we ended up keeping as it provides a consistent deep sound. The gong is of substantial size when hanging on the stand. Very nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: arethereanyusernamesleft

customer_reviews.title: summon the family!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun around the home. my kids love being able to play with it whenever we have dinner. It's a great way to summon the family for supper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delightful surprise
customer_reviews.text: This hanging gong is an impressive piece that I keep in my living room. As I pass it during the day I give it a whack. The tone is deep and strong that resonates thoughout the house. The richness of the sound is more then I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harley

customer_reviews.title: The sound was superior to anything that I had tried
customer_reviews.text: The sound was superior to anything that I had tried. Especially impressive for the size of the gong. However, the stand set did not include a hook to hang the mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gong
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gong. Easy to set up and use, and provides great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gong, best price
customer_reviews.text: I shopped my two favorite music stores for a tam-tam (gong). They sell the gong without a beater or a stand. Purchasing a beater for $45 seemed a little expensive and adding a stand was out of the question. Then on a whim I tried Amazon. I found a package deal - gong, stand, and beater - all for one terrifically low price. The gong sounds great. Hey, it's a Zildjian. What do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mark

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Product is a great value. Great sound in a decent size. If your looking for something desktop size, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: T-roy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good size and great sound - exactly what we needed! We tested it around the office and you could hear it all the way down the hall!
customer_reviews.author: I. Massis

customer_reviews.title: Bang the Gong
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a musicain but it's fun to bang on when my team scores. Chuck Barris had it right when creating and hosting the Gong Show!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Davis

customer_reviews.title: GONG TO SHOW!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for use as part of a yearly "game show" we do for the local library. The kids absolutely LOVED it and I enjoyed being "Gong Guy" for an evening. LOUD! Makes a perfect "buzzer" at the end of each question or round.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing I purchased as a parent
customer_reviews.text: Greatest thing I purchased as a parent. Love it. package came. I opened stand set it up. my kids were arguing. I smacked the gong with the mallet and instantly the kids stopped. I use it every time now, and it works like a charm. this is a must for any parent.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary of purchasing this item, but glad I did. This Gong sounds AMAZING! I was able to make so many different sounds with it, more then expected. I am very excited to create a song using this Gong...I also love the fact that it says "Zildjian" right on the face of it. AMAZING Gong, purchase this item, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amando Calrissian

customer_reviews.title: I love this gong!
customer_reviews.text: Great gong! Fast delivery and there were no issues with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy J.

product_meta.title: Zildjian 12" Table-top Gong and Stand Set
product_meta.description: Color:MultiColoredThis pre-packaged Zildjian Gong set comes with a 12-inch Traditional gong, a specially designed tabletop stand and mallet. The Gong offers a classic gong sound with a partially lathed front and rear. Mallet included. Gong and Tabletop Stand are also available individually.
feature_bullets: New, specially designed tabletop stand and mallet
Gong and Tabletop stand also available individually

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
